newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary Jan-Feb retail/catering down 12 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Hungary Jan-Feb retail/catering down 12 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Hungary's retail and catering turnover dropped 12 percent in the January-February period compared with a year earlier, the Central Statistical Office (KSH) said on Wednesday.
Hungary's retail and catering turnover totalled 386 billion forints in the first two months of the year, five percent up in nominal terms from the same period of 1996.
